means: 盲目的爱国心的，沙文主义的

sentence.Network_en: My ex-boyfriend Anthony was very chauvinistic.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的前男友安东尼大男子主义思想很重。

sentence.Network_en: The tribe has been forced to modify its chauvinistic attitudes.
sentence.Network_cn: 部族不得不改变它的沙文主义姿态。

sentence.Network_en: And seeing others'suffering when considering your chauvinistic interests of great America.
sentence.Network_cn: 在考虑大美沙文利益的时候想想世界的福祉.

entry.tran: 沙文主义的;本国至上主义的
entry.def: If you describe someone as chauvinistic, you believe that they think their own country is more important and morally better than any other.

example.tran: 民族主义的狭隘和大国沙文主义的傲慢

example.ex: ...the highly chauvinistic coverage of the war.
example.tran: 大国沙文主义色彩浓厚的战争报道

entry.tran: 大男子主义的;男人至上的
entry.def: If you describe a man or his behaviour as chauvinistic, you disapprove of him for believing that men are naturally better and more important than women.

example.ex: My ex-boyfriend Anthony was very chauvinistic.
example.tran: 我的前男友安东尼大男子主义思想很重。
